title: Tampa gripped by fear as serial killer walks the streets
itunes:title: Tampa gripped by fear as serial killer walks the streets
description:
A serial killer is believed to be on the loose in Tampa, Florida, after three fatal street shootings in the same neighborhood. Nancy Grace explores the latest evidence in the case with psycho-analyst Dr. Bethany Marshall, Crime scene investigator Sheryl McCollum, forensics expert Joseph Scott Morgan, WFLA-TV reporter Meredyth Censullo, and People magazine reporter Steve Helling.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
